name: World of Warships: Legends – Holiday Cruisers
name_original: World of Warships: Legends – Holiday Cruisers
description:
Nürnberg and Yūbari are nimble light cruisers with solid main battery and torpedo armaments for their tiers! Prepare for the holidays with this pair of ships, a week of Premium Account, and some loot!

This bundle contains: - Tier V Cruiser Nürnberg - Permanent Camouflage for Nürnberg - Tier III Premium Cruiser Yūbari - 7 days of Premium Account - 15x Santa in Red Camouflages - 15x Santa in Blue Camouflages - 2x Secret Santa Crates - 1x Super Santa Crate

If you already have these ships and Camouflages, you'll receive the following as compensation: Camouflage for Nürnberg: 750 doubloons Yūbari: 5,625,000 credits

Content such as Boosters, Commander XP, Camouflages, etc., only become visible upon reaching a certain account level in the game.
